org.openstreetmap.osm
Class Settings

java.lang.Object
  org.openstreetmap.osm.Settings

public final class Settings
extends java.lang.Object

This class contains basic settings that are required to work with OSM-data. (Like the projection-method to use)

Author:
Marcus Wolschon

getPluginProxy

public <T extends IPlugin> T getPluginProxy(java.lang.Class<T> iface,
                                            java.lang.String defaultClassName)
Where getPlugin(Class, String) returns the plugin currently configured. This method returns a dynamic proxy that changes at runtime when the configured plugin changes.

Type Parameters:
T - the interface the result must implement.
Parameters:
iface - the interface the result must implement.
defaultClassName - the default-value
Returns:
the a dynamic proxy to the plugin-instance or an exception.

Load the plugin that is to be used to provide the contract given by the interface.

Type Parameters:
T - the interface the result must implement.
Parameters:
iface - the interface the result must implement.
defaultClassName - the default-value
Returns:
the plugin-instance or an exception.

public static java.util.Set<java.lang.String> getRegistredPlugins(java.lang.Class<? extends IPlugin> iFace)

Parameters:

the list of fully qualified class-names
